name: Blight Run
description:
Hi there, I did a challenge where I tried to make a game in one month's time (ignore the typo in the main menu). However, school exists and I kinda didn't have enough time to make a good game, so here's a decent prototype of one. 

Blight Run is a Top-Down "rogue-like" (It would have been if it was completely finished) game, where you play as a Gunslinger fighting their way through a Blight infested bog.

I recommend playing with music off. (I'm not good at making music, but I tried)

Made by Tyler Fujikawa

Instructions To Open:

-Download Zip File

-Unzip

-Run Blight Run.exe

Known Bugs (If they happen, just restart the game)

-Slowed movement after dying
